description: The sooner you stop spying on your wife, the better. But, in order to stop spying on your wife, try to address the problem in a way that resolves the underlying issue and replaces the rewards you get from snooping. The best way to do this is to plan novel and exciting activities for the two of you to do together. Do something original, different, out of your normal routine.
